# NOTE: This file is generated by yotta: changes will be overwritten!

cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 2.8.11)

include_directories("C:/development/cpp/mbed3/yotta_modules/sockets/source")


set(YOTTA_AUTO_SOCKETS_CPP_FILES
    "C:/development/cpp/mbed3/yotta_modules/sockets/source/v0/TCPAsynch.cpp"
    "C:/development/cpp/mbed3/yotta_modules/sockets/source/v0/UDPSocket.cpp"
    "C:/development/cpp/mbed3/yotta_modules/sockets/source/v0/TCPListener.cpp"
    "C:/development/cpp/mbed3/yotta_modules/sockets/source/v0/SocketAddr.cpp"
    "C:/development/cpp/mbed3/yotta_modules/sockets/source/v0/TCPStream.cpp"
    "C:/development/cpp/mbed3/yotta_modules/sockets/source/v0/Socket.cpp"
)
# force dependency on the config header for cpp files, which CMake otherwise wouldn't track:
set_property(SOURCE ${YOTTA_AUTO_SOCKETS_CPP_FILES} PROPERTY OBJECT_DEPENDS "C:/development/cpp/mbed3/build/frdm-k64f-gcc/yotta_config.h")


add_library(sockets
    ${YOTTA_AUTO_SOCKETS_CPP_FILES}
)

yotta_postprocess_target(LIBRARY sockets)



target_link_libraries(sockets
    sal
    core-util
    minar
)
